user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are correct, but which people would often disagree with because they do not sound nice. These should be accurate statements that are hard for people to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics.

Answer:
Money makes people happier.
People in the US have a higher average IQ than people in Ethiopia.
Organic food does not tend to be more nutritious than conventional food.<COMPLETION_START>Women are, on average, physically weaker than men.
Climate change is real and primarily caused by human activity.
There are inherent biological differences between males and females.
Capitalism has lifted more people out of poverty than any other economic system.
Religion has been the cause of many wars and conflicts throughout history.
The United States has a higher rate of gun violence than other developed countries.
The death penalty does not effectively deter crime.
Affirmative action can lead to reverse discrimination.
Most people are not financially prepared for retirement.
Eating meat is harmful to the environment.
The majority of Americans are overweight or obese.
The global population is growing at an unsustainable rate.
The gender pay gap exists, even when accounting for factors like education and experience.
Police officers are more likely to use force against people of color.
The US healthcare system is more expensive than other developed countries, yet produces worse outcomes.
The criminal justice system disproportionately targets and incarcerates people of color.
The education system in the US is failing to adequately prepare students for the workforce.<COMPLETION_END>
